page.title: 10THE OLD RESERVOIR
page.content:
The reservoir is a place where families go to surf, water ski, relax or just have the sunshine on them when picnicking on the grass.
The reservoir is about five miles round the perimeter and is a quadrilateral in shape.
It used to be owned by the water board but now it is run by Rotherham Metropolitan Borough Council. There is a cottage called Reservoir Cottage.
When you want to go to the reservoir you go down Doncaster Road and then down a little path to the reservoir. Down near the reservoir is a fish pond that leads to a brook which joins onto the reservoir.
